activities: Cvent provides online event registration, web surveys, email marketing, online ticketing and electronic site selection and RFP tools for meeting planners and event venues. Cvent customers may collect personal information in conjunction with a registrant/delegate's willful submission of the requested information in order to register for an event, download an event-related mobile application, respond to a survey, obtain event tickets, or to send or reply to an electronic RFP for services. All data collected is entered directly by the person affected.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
